name: Webdev AutoTag
author: PyWebDev

sections.description: AutoTag is plugins to auto get tag from content, title using search engine (google, bing, stackoverflow) and text processing from content of post
sections.installation:
1. Download the zip file.
  2. Log into WordPress, hover over Plugins, and click Add New.
  3. Click on the Upload Plugin button.
  4. Select the zip file you downloaded.
  5. Click Install Plugin.
  6. Activate.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download the zip file.
  2. Log into WordPress, hover over Plugins, and click Add New.
  3. Click on the Upload Plugin button.
  4. Select the zip file you downloaded.
  5. Click Install Plugin.
  6. Activate.

short_description: AutoTag is plugins to auto get tag from content, title using search engine (google, bing and stackoverflow)
